tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE incidents (
	incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	date DATE,
	location VARCHAR,
	description TEXT,
	reported_by VARCHAR,
	status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE incidents (
  incident_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_date DATE,
  description TEXT,
  location TEXT,
  employee_involved TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE investigation (
  investigation_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id INT,
  investigator TEXT,
  findings TEXT,
  corrective_actions TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES incidents(incident_id)
);

CREATE TABLE witnesses (
    witness_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    name VARCHAR,
    contact_info VARCHAR,
    statement TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (incident_id) REFERENCES incidents(incident_id)
);

CREATE TABLE incidents (
    incident_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    description TEXT,
    reported_by VARCHAR,
    classification VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE investigation (
    investigation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id UUID REFERENCES incidents(incident_id),
    investigator VARCHAR,
    investigation_notes TEXT,
    status VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE corrective_actions (
    action_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id UUID REFERENCES incidents(incident_id),
    action_description TEXT,
    completion_date DATE,
    responsible_person VARCHAR
);

CREATE TABLE employees (
    employee_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR,
    position VARCHAR,
    department VARCHAR,
    start_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE IncidentReports (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_date DATE,
  description TEXT,
  location TEXT,
  reported_by VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE InvestigatorNotes (
  note_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id INT,
  investigator_name VARCHAR(50),
  note TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE CorrectiveActions (
  action_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id INT,
  action_description TEXT,
  responsible_party VARCHAR(50),
  due_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Evidence (
  evidence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id INT,
  evidence_type VARCHAR(50),
  description TEXT,
  file_path TEXT
);
